channel.title: ramona e.j. spence
channel.description: Recent content on ramona e.j. spence

item.title: My Journey into Tech
item.description: [This article is a WIP] I remember being maybe 12 years old when I would spend time on a compaq desktop computer, listening to music and reading about whatever I was hyperfocusing on at the time. I don’t remember what initially sparked my interest in programming and software, but I do remember learning about HackThisSite.org and being enthralled with what I could learn. I loved the mix of tinkering and chalelnging it offered and coding has continued to be that for me.

item.title: Tech Events API
item.description: This Code for Greenville project collects and formats information on tech related meetup and eventbrite events serving the data in a standardized format.

item.title: Chef's Notebook
item.description: At Carolina Code School I had a final project assignment to create a full-stack app. There were more detailed criteria that the app had to meet.
